key_themes: Fed repo liquidity tailwinds supporting equities
Earnings revision cascades offsetting rate-cut optimism
risk_factors: Earnings misses and guidance cuts (software, fintech, discretionary) triggering broader valuation reset
Geopolitical escalation (Taiwan, Ukraine) reversing risk-on sentiment and triggering capital reallocation to defensives
Year-end liquidity unwind in small/mid-caps (IWM) amplifying downside if macro catalyst emerges
Policy uncertainty (regulatory enforcement, tax/capex frameworks) creating contingency risk to bullish thesis
China-PBOC headline risk and U.S.â€“China trade/sanctions escalation as circuit-breaker for current upside bias
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Resistance at Call Wall $700 (146k OI, active hedging). Support at $670 (45k OI, active support). Pivot at Max Pain $687. QQQ: Resistance at Call Wall $630 (33k OI, active) and $625 (29k OI, active). Support at $620 (Max Pain, gravitational pull). Watch for $640 breakout resistance in QQQ if momentum sustains.

Key swing thesis: Small/mid-cap (IWM) under holiday unwind pressure; mega-cap tech (QQQ components) supporting index via Fed liquidity and momentum.
